title: Who Is Climate Activist Harjeet Singh? Why ED Raided His Residence: Fossil Fuel Probe Explained
description: Harjeet Singh is a well-known Indian climate activist who has worked for over two decades with international climate and development organisations.

title: How to join conservation event at ancient hill fort
description: Join the 'Woods for Wood White' conservation event at Bury Ditches, Shropshire Hills, on 4 Feb 2026. Help create butterfly habitats at this Iron Age hill fort.

title: More Than 46 Million in the US Live Within a Mile of Fossil Fuel Infrastructure
description: New BU study finds 46.6 million people in the contiguous US live close to fossil fuel infrastructure; researchers say it could be harming their health.

title: Australians unite through dance as ancient story told
description: Two centuries after a groundbreaking shared corroboree, choreographer Joel Bray returns to the Opera House to unite cultures through an ancient creation story.
